t: Amazon.com: PEABO BRYSON DONT PLAY WITH FIRE vinyl record: CDs & Vinyl
s: This beautiful album from 1982 is one of Peabo Bryson's best but most underrated albums from his tenure as a Capitol Records recording artist. It contains the stunningly-beautiful ballads "Give Me Your Love", "Let Me Be The One You Need" and "We Don't Have to Talk About Love" and even the more uptempo dance numbers are definitely enjoyable. Unfortunately, PTG/Vinyl ...
